name: Dessky reCAPTCHA
author: Dessky

sections.description:
Dessky reCAPTCHA is the lightweight WordPress plugin for website protection against spam comments and brute-force attacks. As name suggests it is protecting your website by adding Google’s reCAPTCHA to the login, comment, registration and forgot password forms.

This plugin was developed by Dessky Team.

Dessky Team does not provide support for the Dessky reCAPTCHA on the WordPress.org forums. In order to get support or make a suggestion from a Dessky Team you will have to Join Our Open Community and Start a Discussion.

DISCUSS WITH THE DESSKY TEAM

JOIN OUR OPEN COMMUNITY: The purpose of this open community is to have a collective place where the community can help each other, and we can get some feedback to improve Dessky reCAPTCHA as well. Joining the community is also a great way to connect with like-minded people and share your experience.

You can also GET THE PREMIUM SUPPORT

User Documentation: Although Dessky reCAPTCHA is already easy to set up, we’ve put together tutorials, guides, and some knowledge bases to help you set up and get started with it.

I have further questions, how do I contact you?

Please fill up the contact form and we would be more than happy to assist.

What is protected with Google reCAPTCHA?

  • Comment form
  • Forgot password form
  • Registration form
  • Login form

You can select in admin where reCAPTCHA will be required.

Credits

Dessky reCAPTCHA is based on the ‘Simple Google reCAPTCHA’ plugin developed by Minor.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the “/wp-content/plugins/dessky-recaptcha” directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” screen in WordPress.

  3. Use the Settings => Dessky reCAPTCHA admin page to configure the plugin.

short_description: Protect your website against spam bots with reCAPTCHA.
